name: Mouse Manor Twirl Skirt PDF eBook Pattern
description:
The Mouse Manor Twirl Skirt is a playground for your new little friend. This eBook includes instructions for making a sweet little stuffed mouse and twirly skirt with a wide variety of pockets for her entertainment. Pockets include a hat, socks/stocking, basket, heart, tulip, teacup, mitten, toadstool, and of course a mouse cottage. The twirl skirt is a blank canvas for the pockets of your choice. Load it up for a great mouse adventure, or keep is simple for a classic look. The possibilities are endless. 

SKILL LEVEL: BEGINNER

SIZES INCLUDED: Little Girls 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7/8, 9/10

MATERIALS NEEDED:
- Light to Mid weight quilting cotton
- 3/4" elastic
- Poly-fil or alternate stuffing for your mouse
- Standard sewing supplies

eBOOK INCLUDES:
- Step by step instructions
- Color photos
- Computer drafted pattern pieces
- Diagrams

You will receive a download link immediately after purchase. File can be downloaded and saved to your computer for 48 hours after purchase has been made. No paper copy will be mailed.

name: Roundabout Wrap Pinafore Dress PDF eBook Pattern
description:
The Roundabout Wrap Pinafore is a versatile jumper style frock. Instructions are included to make an elegant, pleated crossover dress or a simple wrap jumper without pleats. Buttonhole experience isn't necessary, as sew on snap buttons can be substituted. This dress can be worn layered up for winter, or loose and airy for summer. Wear it unpleated and backwards for a completely different look. 

SKILL LEVEL: BEGINNER/INTERMEDIATE

SIZES INCLUDED: Little Girls 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7/8, 9/10

MATERIALS NEEDED:
- Light to Mid weight quilting cotton
- 4 Buttons
- Standard sewing supplies

description: The Every Occasion Twirl Dress has boundless options for any special event or everyday occasion. Make it with a patchwork skirt or twirly tiers. name: Snappy Tunic Tank PDF eBook Pattern
description:
This sweet little tunic is a snap to make. Three different versions are included - Bias Tape Trim, Standard Casings and Rolled Hems (for sergers only).  Wear is alone for a breezy summer top or layer it up for the cooler months. No serger is needed for the first two versions, as all of the seams are encased. Most sizes can be made with less than a yard of fabric! A tutorial is included for making your own bias tape. 

SKILL LEVEL: BEGINNER

SIZES INCLUDED: Little Girls 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7/8, 9/10, 12

MATERIALS NEEDED:
- Light to Mid weight quilting cotton
- 1/4" Elastic
- Double Wide Bias Tape (for Bias Trimmed Version only)
- Single Fold Bias Tape (for Rolled Hem Version only)
- Standard sewing supplies

description: The Patchwork Knot Twirl Dress is a timeless, all-occasion design. Perfect when worn alone for summertime twirling, or layered for a cozy winter look. name: Flouncy Tiered Sundress or Top eBook PDF Pattern
description:
This Flouncy Tiered Sundress or Top eBook contains all the instructions and patterns you'll need to make an adorable strappy sundress or top with a flouncy tiered design. It looks lovely with alternating tiers of only 2 fabrics, or as many as 5 can be used for a really fun mix-it-up effect. Shorten it by following the included instructions, and you have an adorable tiered top.
